item.title: Bicinglés du Mont Ventoux
item.description: The Challenge The Mont-Ventoux Cinglés is a permanent cycling tour that combines all 3 ascents of the famous Mont-Ventoux. The challenge is to do all three paved ascents up to the summit on the same day. Ever since I did this route in 2017 (as one of my first “long-distance challenges”), there was this idea in the back of my head to come back and do the “Bicinglés” - namely doing all three ascent twice on the same day.
